func.title: PlayerMessage

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player for whom to display the message.
Additional message formatting parameters. Also see Format.

func.desc: Displays a message in the viewport of the specified player. Message formatting is done accoring to Message.

example.code: var cursor=GetCursor(0); cursor->PlayerMessage(0, "Hello, I am %s!", GetName(cursor));
example.text: Tells the name of the selected clonk to the owner of the clonk only.
